creditline: Gift of Daniel Greenberg and Susan Steinhauser
description: wide, flat foot; rounded body; slightly football-shaped with concentric rings on either end; one large knot with Y-shaped crack near top; two other large knots near bottom with star-shaped cracks; light to medium brown
marks:
Signature, Date and Inscription

see Signed on bottom, incised: [Howard Lewin  Pine  1/86]
title: Vessel
